channel.title: How do I make the real playername show up?
channel.description:
Hey, I have a small problem, it can probably easily be fixed.. So, when Im on my client and play my server, my name is just random letters and numbers (Which all have a connection - Its my Java player name, I guess ....?) Its on one of my server, not another that I have .. Could It be client sided, like those crashing players ?
So, How do I fix this ?
Please tell me where to place / in what file if I need to add / change something.
Thanks,
Picture is here; [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34qmm8g.png[/img] (It should say 'Villee') EDIT: Oh and yeah, sorry if this was posted before.. But the searches for 'random letters numbers', 'random letter number' displayed no matches.. So did; letter/s/ as name number/s/ as name random letter/s/ random number/s/

item.title: How do I make the real playername show up?
item.dc:creator: @V1LL3 V1LL3
item.description:
@V1LL3 wrote:

Ok, shall try that !

EDIT:

What should I configure it to, lol ?

item.title: How do I make the real playername show up?

@V1LL3 wrote:

Hey, I have a small problem, it can probably easily be fixed…
So, when Im on my client and play my server, my name is just random letters and numbers (Which all have a connection - Its my Java player name, I guess …?) Its on one of my server, not another that I have …
Could It be client sided, like those crashing players ?

So, How do I fix this ?

Please tell me where to place / in what file if I need to add / change something.

Thanks,

Picture is here;

(It should say ‘Villee’)
EDIT:
Oh and yeah, sorry if this was posted before…
But the searches for ‘random letters numbers’, ‘random letter number’ displayed no matches…
So did;

number/s/ as name
random letter/s/
random number/s/
